entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
